module.name: ListFilterEdit
module.short: Implements a control used to filter an associated list box.

descr.p: ListFilterEdit.pas contains classes and types used to implement the TListFilterEdit control, and filtered edit control for values in an associated list box.
This file is part of the LazControls package.

element.name: TImageIndexEvent
element.short: Not used in the current implementation.

element.name: TListFilterEdit
element.short: Implements an edit control used to filter an associated ListBox.

descr.p: TListFilterEdit is a TCustomControlFilterEdit descendant which implements an edit control used to filter an associated TListBox control.

element.name: TListFilterEdit.FFilteredListbox
element.short: The control showing the filtered data.

element.name: TListFilterEdit.FSelectionList
element.short: Stores / restores the selections in the associated control.

element.name: TListFilterEdit.FSimpleSelection
element.short: Stores a flag that indicates a single selection is used for the control.

element.name: TListFilterEdit.FOriginalData
element.short: The original value supplied in the Data property.

element.name: TListFilterEdit.FSortedData
element.short: Sorted values from the Data property.

element.name: TListFilterEdit.FCheckedItems
element.short: Contains the checked items for TCheckListBox.

element.name: TListFilterEdit.SetFilteredListbox
element.short: Sets the value for the FilteredListbox property.

element.name: TListFilterEdit.SetFilteredListbox.AValue
element.short: New value for the property.

element.name: TListFilterEdit.Notification
element.short: Handles a notification when a component is added to or removed from the control.

descr.p: Notification is an overridden method in TListFilterEdit, and calls the inherited method on entry. It ensures that the FilteredListbox property is set to Nil when the component is removed from the class instance. It also sets the value for IdleConnected to False, and resets the internal update flag for the control.

element.name: TListFilterEdit.Notification.AComponent
element.short: Component for the notification.

element.name: TListFilterEdit.Notification.Operation
element.short: Operation performed for the component.

element.name: TListFilterEdit.MoveTo
element.short: Changes the position in FilteredListbox and optionally selects the value.

element.name: TListFilterEdit.MoveNext
element.short: Moves to the next item in FilteredListbox and optionally selects the value.

element.name: TListFilterEdit.MovePrev
element.short: Moves to the previous item in FilteredListbox and optionally selects the value.

element.name: TListFilterEdit.Create
element.short: Constructor for the class instance.

descr.p: Create is the overridden constructor for the class instance.

element.name: TListFilterEdit.Create.AOwner
element.short: Owner for the class instance.

element.name: TListFilterEdit.Destroy
element.short: Destructor for the class instance.

descr.p: Destroy is the overridden destructor for the class instance.

element.name: TListFilterEdit.RemoveItem
element.short: Removes the specified item from the Items property.

element.name: TListFilterEdit.RemoveItem.AItem
element.short: Item located and removed in the method.

element.name: TListFilterEdit.SimpleSelection
element.short: Indicates whether a single selection has been made using the FilteredListbox for the control.

descr.p: The value is updated in StoreSelection. It is set to True when SelectionList contains a single entry. The property value is updated before the the items in SelectionList are checked.
Used in RestoreSelection to prevent unneeded updates to check boxes in SelectionList .
Used in the ApplyFilterCore method when checked values in the SelectionList are located and displayed in FilteredListbox.

element.name: TListFilterEdit.SelectionList
element.short: List of selected items. They are restored after filtering.

element.name: TListFilterEdit.Items
element.short: Maintains the data which is filtered and shown in the Listbox.

element.name: TListFilterEdit.FilteredListbox
element.short: The Listbox associated with the filter edit control.
